pullrequest.title: Re-wrote the instructions to specify gazebo plugins within a ROS URDF file.

content.raw:
Cool! I know I shouldn’t complain for deficiencies when the software is free, but at least warning the users that documentation is deprecated \(v1.9\+ in this case\) could save everyone some frustration.

Thanks for the beautiful simulator!
content.html:
Cool! I know I shouldn’t complain for deficiencies when the software is free, but at least warning the users that documentation is deprecated (v1.9+ in this case) could save everyone some frustration.
